title: Trying to Fix the World through Threat and Accountability Won't Finally Give us What We Want
description:
God told Israel in Malachi that they might not like what he brings when he comes. Nearly 500 years later John the Baptist warns Israel and baptizes a baptism of repentance. Is that sufficient?
